title: My ballpoint pen writes but how to make it darker and smoother? - Quora

response.answer_text: Maybe it's because the color of the pen refill you bought is not deep enough. You can try a darker one. Here are some methods to make your ballpoint smoother. I am not sure if they work. you can have a try. Heat the tip of the pen with a lighter, or heat the pen refill in hot water for 3 to 5 minutes, then take it out, and shake it vigorously; blow from the back of the pen refill.
